short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: UI Mutator to Improve the Twitter Experience

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Birdcage gives you more control over the content that you see on Twitter

 - Make Promoted Content Translucent so you can quickly identify it
 - Collapse Promoted Tweets
 - Turn off the in-tab tweet counter
 - See Notification and DM count in tab
 - Collapse "Who To Follow" and "Trending" UI
 - Add CWs to tweets containing particular words or phrases
